sentences.en: 'Girls need a laboratory, like an orchid needs a nursery, ' says Ms. Beyer.
sentences.cn: 拜尔说，女孩需要一个实验室，就像兰花需要苗圃；

sentences.en: 'Girls need a laboratory, like an orchid needs a nursery, ' says Ms. Beyer.
sentences.cn: 拜尔说，女孩需要一个实验室，就像兰花需要苗圃；

sentences.en: "If I see any kind of flower, I can do it in gelatin, " she says. "I took my orchid gelatinas to friends' parties, and they were wowed.
sentences.cn: “如果我看见一种花，我就能把它制成胶冻，”她说，“我把我的兰花胶冻带到了朋友的聚会上，他们都啧啧称奇。

sentences.en: "If I see any kind of flower, I can do it in gelatin," she says. "I took my orchid gelatinas to friends' parties, and they were wowed.
sentences.cn: “如果我看见一种花，我就能把它制成胶冻，”她说，“我把我的兰花胶冻带到了朋友的聚会上，他们都啧啧称奇。

sentences.en: A quiet orchid in the deep valley represents a exclusive character.
sentences.cn: 深谷中的幽兰象征着一种孤傲的人格.

sentences.en: Central American orchid having spiderlike flowers with prominent green warts.
sentences.cn: 中美洲的一种兰花,具有蜘蛛状花朵,花上长有突出的绿色的瘤.

sentences.en: Gripping my sleeve Ahyuan stared into Orchid's eyes.
sentences.cn: 阿圆扭着我的袖口,只是向着兰花的两只眼睛瞪看.

sentences.en: I like the butterfly orchid, Phalaenopsis like tenacious and selfless dedication.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢蝴蝶兰, 喜欢蝴蝶兰的顽强和无私奉献的精神.

sentences.en: Lan Pu ( Orchid Garden ) Add : Jie Fang Bei Road , Guangzhou Tel : 86677255.
sentences.cn: 兰圃广州市 解放北路 901号86677255.

sentences.en: Looking up at the eaves, Orchid muttered: " Why isn't Spring Maiden back yet? "
sentences.cn: 兰花向天井檐上张一张, 自言自语地说: “ 青姑娘还不回来 呢 !

sentences.en: North American orchid bearing a single leaf and yellowish - brown flowers.
sentences.cn: 北美洲的一种兰花,在晚夏每茎长出一片褶叠的常绿叶,在春季发出一枝有褐色花的花葶.

sentences.en: North American orchid having a spike of violet-purple flowers mixed with white; sepals and petals form a hood.
sentences.cn: 产于北美的一种兰花，花紫色适有白色，萼片和花瓣在和蕊柱后面形成盔瓣。

sentences.en: Orchid, took credit, brought benefit, also make its master reputation far sow.
sentences.cn: 兰花, 带去了信誉, 带来了效益, 也使它的主人声名远播.

sentences.en: Orchids and orchid bees are a classic example of this relationship.
sentences.cn: 兰花和兰蜂就是这种关系的典型例子。

sentences.en: Semidoublel orchid - mauve pansy. Variegated dark green and gold, plain; sucker propagation. Miniature.
sentences.cn: 半重瓣兰花色到淡紫色堇型花. 深绿色和金黄色组合成的一般型斑叶, 只能用 侧芽 繁殖. 迷你型.

sentences.en: The delicate orchid should be protected from cold , wind and frost.
sentences.cn: 娇弱的兰花应被妥善照顾以防风霜的侵袭.

sentences.en: the exotic blooms of the orchid
sentences.cn: 奇异的兰花

sentences.en: The occurrence of apomictic reproductive structures on the leaf of the bog orchid, is of interest.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是在叶状沼兰叶子上发生无融合生殖的结构.

sentences.en: The orchid is a class of plant which I have never tried to grow.
sentences.cn: 兰花这类植物我从来没种过.

sentences.en: There are over 35 000 species of orchid distributed throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 有35,000多种兰花分布在世界各地.

sentences.en: This, in connection with what Orchid had said in the daytime, made me shiver too.
sentences.cn: 听见这突然寂止, 想起兰花日间所说的话, 我也不由得不怕了.

words.tran_cn: [园艺]兰花；[植]兰科植物；淡紫色

trans.tran_en: a plant that has flowers which are brightly coloured and usually shaped
